snippet: The offense has stagnated in the absence of Amar’e Stoudemire and Iman Shumpert. Both seem likely to return Wednesday.
abstract: New York Knicks, who are preparing to face Charlotte Bobcats, expect their offense to be reinvigorated by return of injured players Amare'e Stoudemire and Iman Shumpert.
lead_paragraph: The offense has stagnated in the absence of Amar’e Stoudemire and Iman Shumpert. Both seem likely to return Wednesday.

headline.seo: Knicks Feel Effects of Missing Players
headline.main: Knicks Hope to Get Boost From Return of Rookie
headline.print_headline: Knicks Hope To Get Boost From Return Of Rookie
